tvshowdetails.label: Teen Wolf
tvshowdetails.plot: The series revolves around social outcast Scott McCall, a high school student living in the town of Beacon Hills. Scott's life drastically changes when he is bitten by a werewolf, becoming one himself. He must henceforth learn to balance his problematic new identity with his day-to-day teenage life. The following characters are instrumental to his struggle: Stiles, his best friend; Allison, his love interest who comes from a family of werewolf hunters; and Derek, a mysterious werewolf with a dark past. Throughout the series, he strives to keep his loved ones safe while maintaining normal relationships with them.
tvshowdetails.title: Teen Wolf

1.label: 1x01. Wolf Moon
1.plot: When Scott suffers a werewolf bite, his strange new abilities begin to complicate his life - and his relationship with the new girl in town.
1.title: Wolf Moon

1.label: 1x02. Second Chance at First Line
1.plot: Scott struggles to balance his new life as a werewolf and the pressures of being a teen, all while avoiding werewolf hunters and trying to score a second date with Allison.
1.title: Second Chance at First Line

1.label: 1x03. Pack Mentality
1.plot: Scott and Allison end up in a group date; an animal attack has Stiles' sheriff father on the lookout.
1.title: Pack Mentality

1.label: 1x04. Magic Bullet
1.plot: A new hunter comes to town and shoots Derek, who is certain to die unless Scott can find the right kind of bullet that caused his injury.
1.title: Magic Bullet

1.label: 1x05. The Tell
1.plot: There's another animal attack involving Lydia and Jackson, raising more questions about wild animals. Meanwhile, Scott and Allison skip school and Derek must deal with the werewolf hunters on his own.
1.title: The Tell

1.label: 1x06. Heart Monitor
1.plot: Scott tries to control his transformation so he can spend more time with Allison. Elsewhere, Derek continues trying to make an ally of Scott.
1.title: Heart Monitor

1.label: 1x07. Night School
1.plot: Scott and the others are trapped inside the high school as the Alpha draws near.
1.title: Night School

1.label: 1x08. Lunatic
1.plot: The hunt is on for Derek's whereabouts, meanwhile Stiles tries to help Scott with controlling his transformation when a second full moon is approaching.
1.title: Lunatic

1.label: 1x09. Wolf's Bane
1.plot: Jackson seeks out a specialist regarding the wound on his neck.
1.title: Wolf's Bane

1.label: 1x10. Co-Captain
1.plot: Scott moves to protect his friends from the Alpha, meanwhile Stiles makes a discovery about Derek's family.
1.title: Co-Captain

1.label: 1x11. Formality
1.plot: While Derek is still stuck in captivity, Scott's true identity might become public information.
1.title: Formality

1.label: 1x12. Code Breaker
1.plot: Caught in a war between hunters and werewolves, Scott seeks help from friends and enemies.
1.title: Code Breaker

2.label: 2x01. Omega
2.plot: When Lydia goes missing from the hospital, werewolves and hunters alike begin a search to discover not only where she is, but what she's become.
2.title: Omega

2.label: 2x02. Shape Shifted
2.plot: The night before the new full moon, Isaac's father is murdered. When he's taken into custody, Scott, Stiles and Derek resolve to break him out before the Argents get to him first and before the newly bitten teen turns into a werewolf.
2.title: Shape Shifted

2.label: 2x03. Ice Pick
2.plot: Scott tries to keep Derek from creating new werewolves; Argent officially begins Allison's training; the new creature in town takes another victim.
2.title: Ice Pick

2.label: 2x04. Abomination
2.plot: The new shape-shifter strikes again, and Scott recruits a reluctant Allison to acquire a rare book in Gerard's collection.
2.title: Abomination

2.label: 2x05. Venomous
2.plot: Derek believes that Lydia is the shapeshifter they are after; Scott gathers forces for protection.
2.title: Venomous

2.label: 2x06. Frenemy
2.plot: With startling new information about the shapeshifter, Scott and Stiles hurry to protect their friends while Allison is given an investigative task by her family.
2.title: Frenemy

2.label: 2x07. Restraint
2.plot: As Lydia begins to make connections about the bite from Peter, Jackson causes new problems for Scott and Stiles while Derek has a crisis of faith in his leadership as a new Alpha.
2.title: Restraint

2.label: 2x08. Raving
2.plot: Chris, Scott and Stiles struggle with how to stop the Kanima; Scott and Stiles plan to trap the Kanima at a warehouse party, where Erica will also be present, while Allison's mother plans to take Scott down. Chris and his team of hunters face Derek in a confrontation.
2.title: Raving

2.label: 2x09. Party Guessed
2.plot: Even as his relationship with Allison becomes further strained, Scott and Stiles must attend Lydia's birthday party while Derek locks his new wolves up to watch after them on their first full moon together.
2.title: Party Guessed

2.label: 2x10. Fury
2.plot: Allison tracks Derek to the sheriff's station, where Scott, Stiles, Melissa and Sheriff Stilinski are being held hostage.
2.title: Fury

2.label: 2x11. Battlefield
2.plot: Scott plays in the championship lacrosse game and must also figure out a way to stop Gerard. Meanwhile, Allison continues her hunt for Derek and his wolves.
2.title: Battlefield

2.label: 2x12. Master Plan
2.plot: Scott races to uncover Gerard's master plan following a shocking death on the lacrosse field. Meanwhile, Derek plots to take Gerard down using his own methods.
2.title: Master Plan

3.label: 3x01. Tattoo
3.plot: Derek and Isaac search for Erica and Boyd, and a new wolf pack arrives in town with its own menacing Alpha.
3.title: Tattoo

3.label: 3x02. Chaos Rising
3.plot: One of Stiles' childhood friends goes missing, Scott begins his new fight against the Alpha pack, Lydia and Allison investigate a new mystery, the alpha pack reaches out to Peter and the werewolf hunters begin to recruit after the alpha pack kills one of their own.
3.title: Chaos Rising

3.label: 3x03. Fireflies
3.plot: Boyd and Cora are under the influence of the full moon; Scott and Derek seek help from an unlikely ally.
3.title: Fireflies

3.label: 3x04. Unleashed
3.plot: Scott tries to keep Isaac from confronting the twins in school; Stiles tries to prove his theory about the killings.
3.title: Unleashed

3.label: 3x05. Frayed
3.plot: During a bus ride to a cross-country meet, Scott and his friends flash back to the events of a pre-emptive strike against the Alphas, which has left several injured and possibly one or more dead.
3.title: Frayed

3.label: 3x06. Motel California
3.plot: Scott and the others suffer strange experiences while stranded at a motel; considering the killer's newest targets.
3.title: Motel California

3.label: 3x07. Currents
3.plot: The Darach targets Deaton as the next sacrifice, leaving him hanging by his wrists to die. Kali and the twins go after Derek.
3.title: Currents

3.label: 3x08. Visionary
3.plot: While looking for answers, Scott, Allison and Stiles hear stories told by two unlikely narrators and discover a secret about the color of a werewolf's eyes.
3.title: Visionary

3.label: 3x09. The Girl Who Knew Too Much
3.plot: Allison suspects that someone close to her is involved with the murders; Scott and Stiles want to use Lydia's talents to solve the murders.
3.title: The Girl Who Knew Too Much
